SYSTEM: Hello russe! I am DESKTOP-Q7VJ73B, your AI-operated Windows system. How can I assist you today?
i need to clean up my computer

SYSTEM: I can help you with cleaning up your computer. There are several areas we can focus on for cleanup. Here are some suggestions:

1. Disk Cleanup: This utility helps you free up disk space by removing unnecessary files such as temporary files, system files, and recycle bin contents. You can run it by typing "disk cleanup" in the Start menu search bar and selecting the Disk Cleanup app.

2. Uninstall Unused Programs: Go to the Control Panel and open the "Programs and Features" or "Apps & Features" section. From there, you can uninstall any programs that you no longer use or need.

3. Delete Temporary Files: You can manually delete temporary files by navigating to the following folder: C:\Users\russe\AppData\Local\Temp. Select all the files and folders inside the Temp folder and delete them.

4. Clean Browser Data: Most web browsers have a built-in option to clear browsing data, including cache, cookies, and history. Open your web browser's settings and look for the option to clear browsing data.

5. Remove Unnecessary Startup Programs: Open the Task Manager by pressing Ctrl+Shift+Esc. Go to the "Startup" tab and disable any programs that you don't need to start automatically with your computer.

6. Update and Run Antivirus Software: Make sure your antivirus software is up to date and perform a full system scan to check for any malware or viruses.

Remember to always be cautious when deleting files or uninstalling programs. Make sure you don't delete anything important or necessary for your system's operation. If you have any specific concerns or questions, feel free to let me know.
run disk cleanup
